Articles.Content:
A few days ago I was racking my brain thinking of to what to build when I remembered the Besra Training Jet in GTA V. So I made it in KSP.

It will Require BDArmory, get it [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-90-BDArmory-v0-7-3-%28new-cruise-missiles%29-Dev-Thread-March-23).

**The Kestra TJ1**

The Kestra Training Jet 1 or TJ1, is a trainer jet meant for training young Kerbals how to handle up to 3 G's, missile evasion, solo flying and landing.

Carries over 100 flares which are launched in 6's. Press '1' to Deploy Flares.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/s9kcI)

[**Download**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ls50vocck7vz6q4/Kestra%20JT1.craft?dl=0)

I'm also a member of [Kerbal Military Engineering](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114591-Kerbal-Military-Engineering-BD-Armory/page1), come visit us for more amazing crafts.

- - - Updated - - -

If the above links dont work, heres my disclaimer. This is the first time ive used dropbox and i dont know how to use it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T15:33:03Z" title="04/06/2015 03:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by Commander Jebidiah**

I think it works only when you have a dropbox account.

Also what happened to KODI when I was away?
